title: U.S. Considers Taking To Air To Aid Iraqis Marooned On Mountaintop
teaser: The White House is considering several military options to address an emergency humanitarian crisis in northern Iraq. The administration may approve either air strikes or airdrops of food and medicine to help tens of thousands of refugees stranded on a mountaintop.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
